fr:title.text: Coproduct › universal property of the coproduct

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Coproduct › universal property of the coproduct

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: A coproduct is a colimit of a discrete diagram. Its colegs are called coprojections.
A coproduct is a colimit of a discrete diagram. Its colegs are called coprojections.
A commutatitive diagram in a category C is a functor J\xrightarrow {D} C. The domain J is called the indexing category or the shape of the diagram.
For any ordinal \alpha , there is a preorder whose objects are the smaller ordinals with the usual order.
